item.name: App I/O $2
item.description: Number of kilobytes whose writing to disk has been cancelled by the task. This may occur when the task truncates some dirty pagecache. In this case, some IO which another task has been accounted for will not be happening.

item.name: App CPU task time
item.description: Total percentage of CPU time used by the task. In an SMP environment, the task's CPU usage will be divided by the total number of CPU's if option -I has been entered on the command line.

item.name: Number of file descriptors
item.description: Number of file descriptor slots currently allocated.

item.name: App CPU $2 time
item.description: Percentage of CPU spent by the task in virtual machine (running a virtual processor)

item.name: Total number of major faults
item.description: Total number of major faults the task has made per second, those which have required loading a memory page from disk

item.name: App $2
item.description: The tasks's currently used share of available physical memory.

item.name: Total number of minor faults
item.description: 进程平均每s造成的minor fault，这些错误不会导致从磁盘加载内存页

item.name: App I/O $2
item.description: Number of kilobytes the task has caused to be read from disk per second

item.name: Resident Set Size
item.description: Resident Set Size: The non-swapped physical memory used by the task in kilobytes

item.name: Current state of the process
item.description: Current state of the process. One of "R (running)", "S (sleeping)", "D (disk sleep)", "T (stopped)", "T (tracing stop)", "Z (zombie)", or "X (dead)".

item.name: used as stack
item.description: The amount of memory in kilobytes used as stack, referenced by the task

item.name: App CPU $2 time
item.description: Percentage of CPU used by the task while executing at the system level (kernel)

item.name: Number of threads
item.description: Number of threads associated with current task

item.name: App CPU $2 time
item.description: Percentage of CPU used by the task while executing at the user level (application), with or without nice priority. Note that this field does NOT include time spent running a virtual processor.

item.name: Size of Stack
item.description: The amount of memory in kilobytes reserved for the task as stack, but not necessarily used.

item.name: Virtual Size
item.description: Virtual Size: The virtual memory usage of entire task in kilobytes.

item.name: App I/O $2
item.description: Number of kilobytes the task has caused, or shall cause to be written to disk per second

resource.name: App Memory Usage Of Entire Task

graph.name: App Memory Usage Of Entire Task
